verses.name: Romans 12:6
verses.text: Having then gifts differing according to the grace that is given to us, whether prophecy, let us prophesy according to the proportion of faith;

verses.name: Romans 12:7
verses.text: Or ministry, let us wait on our ministering: or he that teacheth, on teaching;

verses.name: Romans 12:8
verses.text: Or he that exhorteth, on exhortation: he that giveth, let him do it with simplicity; he that ruleth, with diligence; he that sheweth mercy, with cheerfulness.

verses.name: Romans 12:9
verses.text: Let love be without dissimulation. Abhor that which is evil; cleave to that which is good.

verses.name: Romans 12:10
verses.text: Be kindly affectioned one to another with brotherly love; in honour preferring one another;
